channel.title: How do i make my self as the owner (508!)
channel.description:
Can someone tell me how to make my self as the owner 508 server
Not admin, Im talking about the owner.

item.title: How do i make my self as the owner (508!)
item.dc:creator: @FreaKaZoiD-kT FreaKaZoiD-kT
item.description:
@FreaKaZoiD-kT wrote:

public boolean isOwner() {
if (rights == 3) {
return true;
}
return false;
}
public void checkOwner() {
if (isOwner() == true) {
rights = 3;
}

go to ur login method and add this checkOwner();

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my self as the owner (508!)

item.title: How do i make my self as the owner (508!)
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“skillz own, post:6, topic:311583”][quote author=Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS link=topic=408031.msg3012877#msg3012877 date=1256975434]
Considering xEvo’s advice did not make you the “owner” I present.

In class player declare this.

public boolean isOwner() { if (rights == 3) { return true; } return false; } public void checkOwner() { if (isOwner() == true) { rights = 3; } }

Now go to your login method and add this.

checkOwner();

[/quote]
his was for admin this is owner.[/quote]

He already knows that, dumbass plz?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my self as the owner (508!)

item.title: How do i make my self as the owner (508!)
item.dc:creator: @wwe_justin wwe justin
item.description:
@wwe_justin wrote:

xEvo:

Go to your character files and edit your character, then change your player rights to 2 for admin. There’s no owner right unless you create it yourself.

kk tyvm for help

i could rep you if i had 15 reps =P

Read full topic
